articles.title: Pavel Zacha scores with 6 seconds left in OT as Bruins beat Senators 3-2 and earn fifth straight victory
articles.description:
Linus Ullmark, the 2023 Vezina Trophy winner with Boston, picked up his first loss against the Bruins since they traded him to the Senators before the 2024-25 season.

The post Pavel Zacha scores with 6 seconds left in OT as Bruins beat Senators 3-2 and earn fifth straight victory appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Pavel Zacha scored with 6 seconds left in OT, securing a 3-2 win for the Bruins.
Linus Ullmark faced his first loss against the Bruins since his trade to the Senators.
The Bruins' victory marks their fifth consecutive win, boosting local team morale.

articles.title: Tripadvisor to cut 20% of staff amid internal restructuring
articles.description:
The travel review giant said the cuts are part of a strategic effort to merge internal operations and sharpen its focus on experience-driven growth.

The post Tripadvisor to cut 20% of staff amid internal restructuring appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tripadvisor announces a 20% staff reduction as part of restructuring efforts.
The layoffs will affect numerous Boston-based employees amid operational changes.
Local businesses relying on Tripadvisor may face decreased visibility and support.
